WorkItem.ClosedComment: User misconception, he wasn't using Regrowth in his rotation so of course the matching glyph doesn't have value.
WorkItem.Description: Clicking on/off Glyph of Regrowth seems to have no effect one way or the other, unsure if this is working as intended ir, or overlooked. (Its the same way in the new beta)
WorkItem.Summary: [Tree] Glyph of Regrowth is showing no increase in healing

Comments.Message:
Look at the chart showing time spent on each spell, and you'll see that Rawr doesn't think you are casting regrowth, so the glyph doesn't help.  Under individual spell comparisons, you will see the glyph making a difference.

To force Rg in your overall rotation, go to Options/Stats/Single Target Maximum Healng Mix, and pick a rotation that has Rg* (note the asterisk).  I think those rotations use Rg as the preferred direct heal.

It isn't clear to me that you can select a rotation that uses Nourish as your direct heal, but still clips Rg, to take advantage of Glyph of Regrowth.  I also don't see how Rawr lets you use Rg (clipped for the glyph) for raid healing.
